name: Zhongli
title: Vago Mundo
description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

normal.1: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, causing stone spears to fall along his path.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Every mountain, rock and inch of land is filled with the power of Geo, but those who can wield such powers freely are few and far between.
description.3: Commands the power of earth to create a Stone Stele.
description.6: Causes nearby Geo energy to explode, causing the following effects:
7: If their maximum number hasn't been reached, creates a Stone Stele.
Creates a shield of jade. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Zhongli's Max HP.
If there are nearby targets with the <geo>Geo element</geo>, it will drain a large amount of <geo>Geo element</geo> from a maximum of 2 such targets. This effect does not cause DMG.
description.11: Additionally, it will intermittently resonate with other nearby <geo>Geo constructs</geo>, dealing <geo>Geo DMG</geo> to nearby opponents.
description.12: The Stone Stele is considered a <geo>Geo construct</geo> that can both be climbed and used to block attacks.
description.13: Only one Stele created by Zhongli himself may initially exist at any one time.
description.16: Possesses 150% DMG Absorption against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
description.17: Characters protected by the Jade Shield will decrease the Elemental RES and Physical RES of opponents in a small AoE by 20%. This effect cannot be stacked.
description.19: A true master of stone may carve jade and shape gold.

description.0: Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive <geo>Geo DMG</geo> to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the <geo>Petrification</geo> status to them.
description.3: Opponents affected by the <geo>Petrification</geo> status cannot move.

description.0: When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:
1: Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength.
description.2: Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield disappears.

description.0: Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
1: Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1.39% of Max HP.
Dominus Lapidis' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.9% of Max HP.
Planet Befall's DMG is increased by 33% of Max HP.

description.0: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Polearm-type weapons.
Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by Dominus Lapidis that may exist simultaneously to 2.
Planet Befall grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.
Increases the Level of Dominus Lapidis by 3.
Increases Planet Befall's AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.
Increases the Level of Planet Befall by 3.
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
description.1: A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.
